titles.title: A resolution calling on the President of the United States immediately to recommend new candidates for the positions of the Attorney General of the United States and the President of the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (commonly known as the "World Bank") in order to preserve the integrity and the efficacy of the Department of Justice and the World Bank.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 5/17/2007--Introduced. Calls on the President to recommend new candidates for the positions of the U.S. Attorney General and the President of the World Bank.
